'''Tasses Ragout''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe can be obtained  from [[Earnshaw]] upon the completion of the {{Quest|Upon a Flowery Field of Grass}}.

Depending on the quality, Tasses Ragout restores '''20'''/'''22'''/'''24'''% of Max HP and an additional '''900'''/'''1,200'''/'''1,500''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Recipe==
{{Recipe
|type = Cooking
|Tomato = 3
|Onion = 3
|Salt = 2
|sort = Tomato; Onion; Salt
}}

==Trivia==
* The description for the Delicious variant of the dish is likely a reference to the movie ''{{w|Ratatouille (film)|Ratatouille}}''.
* This dish is the only recovery dish where all the ingredients can be bought in all of the general store
